question: Match column-I with column-II. Select the option with correct combination.
| Column - I | Column - II |
| 1. Hypertonic | p. Two molecules move in the same direction across the membrane. |
| 2. Capillarity | q. External solution is more concentrated than cell sap. |
| 3. Symport | r. Water loss in the form of droplets. |
| 4. Guttation | s. Ability of water to rise in thin tubes. |
explanation: Hypertonic (1) -> External solution more concentrated (q). Capillarity (2) -> Ability of water to rise in thin tubes (s). Symport (3) -> Two molecules move in same direction (p). Guttation (4) -> Water loss in droplets (r).
